page.title: 09ENTERTAINMENT IN N.BRISTOL
page.content: In the{Southmead}area there is little entertainment for the densely populated community.An active old peoples club exists with bingo, concerts & day trips held.Hardly any entertainment for youths.Community Centre provides some clubs & entertainment.Much entertainment is found as pub sports & games.At {Henbury}all activities centre round a social club. In{Westbury}all forms of entertainment take place at the village hall.Activities range from discos to plays to keep fit.It is widely used & is a vital centre of village life.
